title: WizardStep Props
description: The primary child component for Wizard. Step props are used for the list of steps managed in context.

body.description: Props for WizardBody that wraps content by default. (Type: Omit<Omit<WizardBodyProps, 'children'>, 'children'>)

children.description: Optional for when the step is used as a parent to sub-steps (React component or element)

footer.description: Replaces the step's footer. The step's footer takes precedence over the wizard's footer. (Type: React.ReactElement<any> | Partial<WizardFooterProps>)

isDisabled.description: Flag to disable the step's navigation item

isExpandable.description: Flag to determine whether parent steps can expand or not. Defaults to false.

isHidden.description: Flag to determine whether the step is hidden

name.description: Name of the step's navigation item (React component or element)

navItem.description: Replaces the step's navigation item or its properties. (Type: Partial<WizardNavItemProps> | CustomWizardNavItemFunction | React.ReactElement<any>)

status.description: Used to determine icon next to the step's navigation item
